title: Clean Energy Hackathon
description: Clean Energy Hackathon is a global competition that challenges participants to develop innovative solutions for the clean energy sector. The event brings together students, professionals, and enthusiasts to showcase their creativity and skills in clean energy solutions.

title: Ideathon
description: Ideathon is a competition that challenges participants to use technology to solve real-world problems.

title: ASEAN Cyber Shield

title: AWS Academy Cloud Foundations
description: AWS Academy Cloud Foundations certification demonstrating knowledge of cloud computing concepts, AWS services, security, architecture, pricing, and support.

title: C Programming Certificate
description: Certificate demonstrating proficiency in C programming language, including data structures, algorithms, and software development fundamentals.

title: Certificate of Excellence
description: Certificate of Excellence recognizing outstanding academic performance and achievements in educational programs.

title: Digital Forensic Certificate
description: Certificate in Digital Forensics covering computer forensics, evidence collection, analysis techniques, and legal aspects of digital investigations.

title: Incident Response Certificate
description: Certificate in Incident Response covering cybersecurity incident handling, threat detection, containment, and recovery procedures.

title: Malware Development and Analysis Certificate
description: Advanced certificate in malware development and analysis, covering reverse engineering, malware detection, and security analysis techniques.

title: Project Management Certificate
description: Certificate in Project Management covering project planning, execution, monitoring, and control methodologies.

title: Real-world System Exploitation Certificate
description: Certificate in Real-world System Exploitation covering penetration testing, vulnerability assessment, and system security testing.

title: Real-world Web Exploitation Certificate
description: Certificate in Real-world Web Exploitation covering web application security, OWASP vulnerabilities, and web penetration testing techniques.

title: Basic Certificate
description: Basic certification demonstrating fundamental knowledge and skills in the specified field of study.

title: REAN Institute Certificate
description: Certificate from REAN Institute recognizing completion of specialized training program and achievement of learning objectives.

title: General Achievement Certificate
description: General achievement certificate recognizing completion of educational program and demonstration of required competencies.

title: Additional Achievement Certificate
description: Additional achievement certificate recognizing completion of specialized training or educational program.
